üìò How to Vote Using VoteYatra

Follow these simple steps to participate in the election process securely and smoothly:

Step 1: Register Your Email

Go to the Register page and enter your email. You‚Äôll receive an OTP to verify your identity.

Step 2: Complete Your Profile

Once OTP is verified, provide your full name, Aadhaar number, and create a secure password to complete your registration.

Step 3: Log In

Use your registered email and password to log in securely into the platform.

Step 4: Book Your Voting Slot

Navigate to the ‚ÄúBook Slot‚Äù section and choose an available time slot to vote.

Step 5: Cast Your Vote

Once your slot is active, head over to the ‚ÄúCast Vote‚Äù section, choose your preferred candidate, and submit your vote.

üõ°Ô∏è Your vote is confidential and secure. Make your voice count!

); } export default VotingTutorial;
